column2: Jiayin Group, Inc. engages in online individual finance marketplace in China connecting individual investors and individual borrowers. The company is headquartered in Shanghai, Shanghai and currently employs 831 full-time employees. The firm's loan facilitation services mainly matches investors and borrowers through the Company's marketplace. The post-origination service consist of services provided after loan origination. The firm also provides automated investment programs and loan transfers over the Company's secondary loan market services.
